scripts.authbind: sudo apt-get -qq install authbind; sudo install -o $USER -m 755 /dev/null /etc/authbind/byport/443; sudo install -o $USER -m 755 /dev/null /etc/authbind/byport/80

deployScripts.start: XDG_CONFIG_HOME=/opt/theatersoft/.config npm explore @theatersoft/server npm run start
deployScripts.start-capture: XDG_CONFIG_HOME=/opt/theatersoft/.config npm explore @theatersoft/server npm run start-capture
